title: Sichuan Style Pork Slices
directions: Firstly place the pork belly or hind leg in cold water, add ginger slices, green onion and Sichuan peppercorn and then heat to boil. Slightly slow the fire to medium and cook for around 30 minutes to 40 minutes.
Meanwhile, add ginger, garlic, green onion and a small pinch of salt in a small bowl, add ¼ cup of warm water. Soak for 5-10 minutes.
Mix Chinese red oil, light soy sauce, black vinegar and sugar in another small bowl. Set aside.
Transfer out and cool down to warm. Cut the pork into slices, as thin as possible.
Place shredded cucumber in the bottom of the serving plate and then lay the pork slices.
